summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 7.6°C) and outside temperature (down 6.8°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.4 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 13223 lux) and cloud levels (up 636 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 14911 lux) and cloud levels (up 1586 m) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 636.1m lower than yesterday, 580.3m lower than the past week, 1586.1m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 1059m and a high of 3380m, averaging 1088.1m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
cloud levels.summary: Partial cloudiness with some periods of sun.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; moderate and mild. Also, air will feel comfortable and balanced. A few light raindrops may fall, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and dim or diffuse light conditions. Weather could become unsettled.
